channel.title: DailyGame GamesDailygame
channel.description: DailyGame's videogame news and reviews for Xbox, PlayStation 2, PS2, Nintendo GameCube and Game Boy Advance.

item.title: New RSS/XML Feed URLS
item.description: New site means new URLs for our RSS/XML feeds.

item.title: EA Announces the "Madden NFL 2005" Soundtrack
item.description: It's a mix of hip-hop and rock. Who'd have ever guessed that?

item.title: Atari is Driven by Australian Sales
item.description: The company's "DRIV3R" heads to the top of the sales charts down under.

item.title: "NCAA Football 2005" Goes Gold
item.description: The first Xbox Live-enabled game from EA is on its way.

item.title: Square-Enix to Develop for Xbox 2?
item.description: Bloomberg Japan reports that it's more than just a rumor this time.

item.title: More Screens of "Ace Combat 5" for PS2
item.description: Take to the skies with these screens!

item.title: Prepare to Throw Down with "Showdown"
item.description: Acclaim ships its newest "Legends of Wrestling" game in North America.

item.title: Huge Pack of "Gran Turismo 4" Screens
item.description: If Sony's upcoming racer looks anywhere near as good as these screenshots of the Paris track, we're in for a treat!

item.title: New "Colin McRae Rally 2005" Video
item.description: Want to see some of the new cars in the game? Then check out this video.

item.title: "ToCA 2" Coming to PS2
item.description: It ruled racing on the Xbox, can it do the same for PS2?

item.title: Vivendi Working on "Robots" Game
item.description: Another movie license coming to consoles and PC

item.title: Sierra Games Closing Its Doors?
item.description: Nearly its entire staff will be laid off as hundreds more VU employees also say goodbye.

item.title: "MTV Music Generator 3: This is the Remix Ships"
item.description: Get ready to mix it up on PS2 and Xbox.

item.title: New "Ratchet and Clank 3" Media
item.description: A screenie each of two new levels.

item.title: "Street Racing Syndicate" Web Site Online
item.description: Namco's racer comes up from the underground.
